item.title: 4.1. Introducing 'Randomness'
item.description: Suppose you want a random number between 2 and 7 - with PHP, there are 2 main ways you could do this: Generating a random number directly To do this, use the mt_rand() function. It takes in two numbers, and generates a random number between them (inclusive). For example: $two_to_seven = mt_rand(2, 7); Shuffling an array of values This is like shuffling a pack of cards and choosing the value of the topmost card.
